name: Makara Walkway
description: If you love climbing cliff-tops, stunning ocean views, and lush farmland this walk is for you, great on a sunny day and sheltered from those southerly winds.
restrictions: Part of track closed for lambing season between 1 August and 1 October. Access to the gun emplacements is via Makara Beach during this time.

name: Cuba Street
restrictions: beware of denim-wearing hipster chicks who read Hermann Hesse

name: Somewhere else
description: A cool spot to hang also
restrictions: Beans in the sun with doggos
